extensionDescription.message: Quickly go to a JIRA issue by either bringing focus to an already open tab or opening a new one.
extensionDescription.description: This is the plain-text description that shows up summarizing what the extension does. It can't be longer than 132 characters.

browserActionTitle.message: Open or quickly 'go to' any JIRA issue
browserActionTitle.description: Shown as the title of the button which, when clicked, shows the input field.

submitButtonLabel.description: The label of the submit button
